name: Who Is You
description:
Who is You is a game in which you have to help the main character figure out himself. Create a character based on your preferences, put the best features of you in him, or maybe, on the contrary, spoil his fate. But remember, after surgery, hallucinations are possible due to the use of pain medication! And much can be imagined ... And contact with aliens, and the harsh life of slavery, and playing blackjack, or maybe even getting a champion's title in the ring.

Make the right choice from the proposed ones, control your budget, take care of your health, take a rest in time and return to the drawn world in which you will be told about your psychological type and other things. Or maybe you want to repeat the adventure again? It all depends on you!


Is waiting for you:
- several quizzes in a comic style
- travel map with many activities
- unusual storyline
